summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to Jeffrey Epstein, discussing the attachment of a list of articles related to high-frequency trading (HFT). It highlights Staley's position as Chief Executive Officer of the Investment Bank at JPMorgan and indicates a professional relationship between him and Epstein.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is identified as the Chief Executive Officer of the Investment Bank at JPMorgan, who is communicating with Jeffrey Epstein regarding articles on high-frequency trading.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email from Jes Staley, indicating a professional relationship and communication regarding financial topics.

connections.description: Jes Staley, as CEO of JPMorgan's Investment Bank, is communicating with Jeffrey Epstein about financial articles, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on August 27, 2010.
Jes Staley is the Chief Executive Officer of the Investment Bank at JPMorgan.
The email discusses a list of articles on high-frequency trading.
The email indicates a professional relationship between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein.
